com.samsung.spensdk.applistener

Interface SCanvasMatrixChangeListener


  • public interface SCanvasMatrixChangeListener
    This is an S-Canvas-based listener interface for events that affect the screen ratio and location when zooming and panning.
    Since:
    S-Pen SDK 2.2

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onMatrixChanged(Matrix matrix)
      This handler is called for S-Canvas screen change events.
      void onMatrixChangedByScrollbar(Matrix matrix)
      This handler is called when an SCanvas screen change event is caused by a ScrollBar.
      void onMatrixChangeFinished()
      This handler is called when an S-Canvas screen change event is complete.

    • Method Detail

      • onMatrixChanged

        void onMatrixChanged(Matrix matrix)
        This handler is called for S-Canvas screen change events.
        Parameters:
        matrix - A matrix object that sets the location of the S-CanvasView screen.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2

      • onMatrixChangeFinished

        void onMatrixChangeFinished()
        This handler is called when an S-Canvas screen change event is complete.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2

      • onMatrixChangedByScrollbar

        void onMatrixChangedByScrollbar(Matrix matrix)
        This handler is called when an SCanvas screen change event is caused by a ScrollBar.
        Parameters:
        matrix - A matrix object that sets the location of the SCanvasView screen
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.3
